question: You are really busy at work and a colleage is telling you their life story and personal woes. You:
options: Think it is more important to give some of your time
Listen, but with only half an ear
Interrupt and explain that you are really busy at the moment

question: You’ve been sitting in the doctor’s waiting room for more than 25 minutes. You:
options: Look at your watch every two minutes
Bubble with inner anger, but keep quiet
Explain to other people in the room that the doctor is always running late
Complain in a loud voice, while tapping your foot impatiently

question: You’re having an animated discussion with a colleague regarding a project that you’re in charge of. You:
options: Think that they are obviously right
Defend your own point of view, tooth and nail

question: During dinner parties at your home, you have a hard time with people who:
options: Ask you to tell a story in front of everyone else
Hang around with you all evening
Always drag the conversation bag to themselves
